appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: Display YouTube's player bar outside the video.

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

tooltipText_isActive.description: Tooltip text for toggle button when extension is active

tooltipText_isInactive.description: Tooltip text for toggle button when extension is inactive

popup_title.message: Thanks for using Outside YouTube Player Bar!

popup_description.message: If you have anything about this extension, please contact GitHub Issue or Google Forms.

popup_pleaseReview.message: Please review if you don't mind.
